article: How to Find an AirTag in Your Car With an iPhone or Android
intro: AirTags are small, portable tracking devices created by Apple to help you keep tabs on important items like your keys, wallet, or purse. Unfortunately, AirTags can also be used to track a person's location. If you're concerned someone has placed an AirTag on your vehicle, keep reading to learn how to locate the AirTag and disable it.
